com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPJumpView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.ViewGroup
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.ViewGroup
          com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPJumpView

public class WPJumpView
extends ViewGroup

View that provides quick access to various groups of data.

Examples include choosing a letter from the alphabet, a month of the year, etc.

Note: requires the android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW permission!
This currently only supports alphabetic selection in the Latin/ English character set.

Since:
05-18-2012
